item.title: 2021 Christmas Message to Our Readers- “But now…”
item.description: “But now…” Texts****: Genesis 26: 22 – 25 Dear Reader, Hearty greetings to you, the family and friends in this season of heralding the love of God through Christ Jesus. I bring this Christmas edition to you from the first book of the Bible, Genesis 26:22-25. The events recorded in this chapter took place after Abraham’s death.
